00074             function                __construct()
00075             {
00076                   try
00077                   {
00078                         $this->CachedMultyFS = get_package( 'cached_multy_fs' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00079                         $PackageName = 'gui::context_set::common_state_startup::common_state_startup_utilities';
00080                         
00081                         $this->CommonStateStartupUtilities = get_package( $PackageName , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00082                         
00083                         $this->DefaultControllers = get_package( 'gui::context_set::default_controllers' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00084                         $this->DefaultViews = get_package( 'gui::context_set::default_views' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00085                         $this->LocalOptions = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00086                         $this->PermitAlgorithms = get_package( 'permit::permit_algorithms' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00087                         $this->Security = get_package( 'security' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00088                         $this->Trace = get_package( 'trace' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00089                         $this->UserAlgorithms = get_package( 'user::user_algorithms' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00090                   }
00091                   catch( Exception $e )
00092                   {
00093                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00094                   }
00095             }

00151             function                trace_no_need_to_process_message( $StateName )
00152             {
00153                   try
00154                   {
00155                         $this->Trace->add_trace_string( '{lang:no_need_to_process_message}' , COMMON );
00156                         
00157                         $this->Trace->add_trace_string( 
00158                               $this->Prefix.'_context_action: '.$this->Security->get_gp( 
00159                                     $this->Prefix.'_context_action' , 
00160                                     'command' , 
00161                                     'not set' 
00162                               )
00163                         );
00164                         $this->Trace->add_trace_string( 
00165                               $this->Prefix.'_action: '.$this->Security->get_gp( 
00166                                     $this->Prefix.'_action' , 
00167                                     'command' , 
00168                                     'not set' 
00169                               )
00170                         );
00171                   }
00172                   catch( Exception $e )
00173                   {
00174                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00175                   }
00176             }

00242             function                run_controller_state( &$ContextSet , $Options , $StateName , $Config )
00243             {
00244                   try
00245                   {
00246                         if( strpos( $Config , 'success_message=' ) === false )
00247                         {
00248                               $Config .= "\r\nsuccess_message=".$this->Prefix.'_'.$StateName.'_was_completed';
00249                         }
00250                         if( strpos( $Config , 'cleanup_fields=' ) === false )
00251                         {
00252                               $Config .= "\r\ncleanup_fields=".$this->Prefix."_action,".$this->Prefix."_context_action";
00253                         }
00254                         if( strpos( $Config , 'success_func=' ) === false )
00255                         {
00256                               $Config .= "\r\nsuccess_func=$StateName";
00257                         }
00258 
00259                         $this->LocalOptions->clear();
00260                         $this->LocalOptions->append_settings( $Config );
00261                         $this->LocalOptions->add_settings_from_object( $Options );
00262                         $this->LocalOptions->set_undefined( 'access_package_version' , 'last' );
00263                         $this->LocalOptions->set_undefined( $StateName.'_func' , $StateName );
00264 
00265                         $ContextSet->Context->load_raw_config( $Config );
00266                         if( $ContextSet->run_execution( $this->LocalOptions , $this->DefaultControllers , 1 ) )
00267                         {
00268                               return( true );
00269                         }
00270 
00271                         return( false );
00272                   }
00273                   catch( Exception $e )
00274                   {
00275                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00276                   }
00277             }
00278             
00309             function                process_controller_state( &$ContextSet , $Options , $StateName )
00310             {
00311                   try
00312                   {
00313                         $Config = $this->CommonStateStartupUtilities->get_common_state_config( 
00314                               $ContextSet , $Options , $StateName
00315                         );
00316 
00317                         if( $Config !== false )
00318                         {
00319                               return( $this->run_controller_state( $ContextSet , $Options , $StateName , $Config ) );
00320                         }
00321                         else
00322                         {
00323                               $this->trace_config_was_not_found_message( $StateName );
00324                         }
00325                         
00326                         return( false );
00327                   }
00328                   catch( Exception $e )
00329                   {
00330                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00331                   }
00332             }
00333             
00368             function                run_view_state( &$ContextSet , $Options , $StateName , $Config )
00369             {
00370                   try
00371                   {
00372                         $this->LocalOptions->clear();
00373                         $this->LocalOptions->append_settings( $Config );
00374                         
00375                         if( strpos( $Config , 'success_func' ) === false )
00376                         {
00377                               $Suffix = '_form';
00378                               $Config .= "\r\nsuccess_func=".$StateName.$Suffix;
00379                               $this->LocalOptions->set_undefined( 'success_func' , $StateName.$Suffix );
00380                         }
00381                         
00382                         $this->LocalOptions->add_settings_from_object( $Options );
00383                         $this->LocalOptions->set_undefined( 'access_package_version' , 'last' );
00384                         
00385                         $ContextSet->Context->load_raw_config( $Config );
00386                         
00387                         if( $ContextSet->Context->execute( $this->LocalOptions , $this->DefaultViews ) )
00388                         {
00389                               return( true );
00390                         }
00391                         
00392                         return( false );
00393                   }
00394                   catch( Exception $e )
00395                   {
00396                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00397                   }
00398             }

00431             {
00432                   try

00435                               $ContextSet , $Options , $StateName , '_form'

00481             function                list_form_state_startup( &$ContextSet , $Options )
00482             {
00483                   try
00484                   {
00485                         $this->Trace->start_group( "{lang:list_state}" );
00486                         
00487                         $ContextAction = $this->Security->get_gp( $this->Prefix.'_context_action' , 'command' , '' );
00488 
00489                         if( $ContextAction == '' )
00490                         {
00491                               $Result = $this->process_view_state( $ContextSet , $Options , 'list' );
00492                               
00493                               $this->Trace->end_group();
00494                               
00495                               return( $Result );
00496                         }
00497                         else
00498                         {
00499                               $this->trace_no_need_to_process_message( 'list' );
00500                               
00501                               $this->Trace->end_group();
00502                         
00503                               return( false );
00504                         }
00505                   }
00506                   catch( Exception $e )
00507                   {
00508                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00509                   }
00510             }

00540                   try

00543

00545

00547                         {

00549                               
00550                               $this->Trace->end_group();

00595             function                create_form_state_startup( &$ContextSet , $Options )
00596             {
00597                   try
00598                   {
00599                         $this->Trace->start_group( "{lang:create_form_state}" );
00600                         
00601                         $ContextAction = $this->Security->get_gp( $this->Prefix.'_context_action' , 'command' , '' );
00602                         $Direct = $Options->get_setting( 'direct_create' , 0 );
00603                         
00604                         if( $ContextAction == 'create_record_form' || $Direct != 0 )
00605                         {
00606                               $Result = $this->process_view_state( $ContextSet , $Options , 'create' );
00607                               
00608                               $this->Trace->end_group();

01255             function                run_commmon_states( &$ContextSet , $Options )
01256             {
01257                   try
01258                   {
01259                         $this->set_constants( $ContextSet , $Options );
01260                         
01261                         if( $this->list_form_state_startup( $ContextSet , $Options ) !== false )return( true );
01262                         if( $this->delete_state_startup( $ContextSet , $Options ) !== false )return( true );
01263                         if( $this->create_form_state_startup( $ContextSet , $Options ) !== false )return( true );
01264                         if( $this->create_state_startup( $ContextSet , $Options ) !== false )return( true );
01265                         if( $this->public_create_form_state_startup( $ContextSet , $Options ) !== false )return( true );
01266                         if( $this->public_create_state_startup( $ContextSet , $Options ) !== false )return( true );
01267                         if( $this->update_form_state_startup( $ContextSet , $Options ) !== false )return( true );
01268                         if( $this->update_state_startup( $ContextSet , $Options ) !== false )return( true );
01269                         if( $this->public_update_form_state_startup( $ContextSet , $Options ) !== false )return( true );
01270                         if( $this->public_update_state_startup( $ContextSet , $Options ) !== false )return( true );
